name: Response Playbook for Command and Scripting Interpreter Attack
description: This playbook addresses an incident involving the exploitation of a web application via command and scripting interpreter, leading to unauthorized access and data exfiltration.

action--c3f3a3f1-e26f-42a2-a6fa-a4ded823.name: Terminate suspicious PowerShell session
action--c3f3a3f1-e26f-42a2-a6fa-a4ded823.description: Terminate any active PowerShell sessions that could be malicious.

parallel--321761c3-991d-4cc4-bff2-4c1fcc.name: Perform additional mitigations
parallel--321761c3-991d-4cc4-bff2-4c1fcc.description: Execute multiple mitigation strategies in parallel.

action--0dfe5efc-1848-4e9c-a795-e0c7b4ee.name: Scan for malware across the network
action--0dfe5efc-1848-4e9c-a795-e0c7b4ee.description: Run network scan for malware detection.

action--79c337c1-fc46-43c5-bc71-0cb7ffec.name: Block outbound traffic to known malicious IP
action--79c337c1-fc46-43c5-bc71-0cb7ffec.description: Block any outbound traffic to malicious IP addresses.

while-condition--26371b92-9241-45f9-a662.name: Check malware scan results
while-condition--26371b92-9241-45f9-a662.description: Loop until malware scan results are clean.
